text: @realDonaldTrump Funny! With all the deregulation, and tax cuts he only reduce the unemployment rate in his 3 plus years in office prior to Covid-19 by a mere 1.2% While Obama/Biden by 5.3% (public record) So much for the best job creator president in history!
